alluxio.master.lineage

Class LineageMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.master.AbstractMaster
      • alluxio.master.lineage.LineageMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalCheckpointStreamable, Master

    @NotThreadSafe
public final class LineageMaster
extends AbstractMaster
    The lineage master stores the lineage metadata in Alluxio, and it contains the components that manage all lineage-related activities.

      • processJournalEntry

        public void processJournalEntry(Journal.JournalEntry entry)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Processes a journal entry and applies it to the master. These entries follow the checkpoint entries.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to process to update the state of the master
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O error occurs

      • start

        public void start(boolean isLeader)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Starts the master, as the leader master or the standby master. Here, the master should initialize state and possibly start threads required for operation. If isLeader is true, the master should also initialize the journal and write the checkpoint file.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Master
        Overrides:
        start in class AbstractMaster
        Parameters:
        isLeader - if true, the master should behave as the leader master in the system. If false, the master should act as a standby master.
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O error occurs

      • streamToJournalCheckpoint

        public void streamToJournalCheckpoint(JournalOutputStream outputStream)
                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the output stream to write to for the journal checkpoint
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getLineageStoreView

        public LineageStoreView getLineageStoreView()
        Returns:
        a lineage store view wrapping the contained lineage store

      • createLineage

        public long createLineage(List<AlluxioURI> inputFiles,
                          List<AlluxioURI> outputFiles,
                          Job job)
                   throws InvalidPathException,
                          FileAlreadyExistsException,
                          BlockInfoException,
                          IOException,
                          AccessControlException,
                          FileDoesNotExistException
        Creates a lineage. It creates a new file for each output file.
        Parameters:
        inputFiles - the input files
        outputFiles - the output files
        job - the job
        Returns:
        the id of the created lineage
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - if the path to the input file is invalid
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the output file already exists
        BlockInfoException - if fails to create the output file
        IOException - if the creation of a file fails
        AccessControlException - if the permission check fails
        FileDoesNotExistException - if any of the input files do not exist

      • deleteLineage

        public boolean deleteLineage(long lineageId,
                             boolean cascade)
                      throws LineageDoesNotExistException,
                             LineageDeletionException
        Deletes a lineage.
        Parameters:
        lineageId - id the of lineage
        cascade - the flag if to delete all the downstream lineages
        Returns:
        true if the lineage is deleted, false otherwise
        Throws:
        LineageDoesNotExistException - the lineage does not exist
        LineageDeletionException - the lineage deletion fails

      • reinitializeFile

        public long reinitializeFile(String path,
                             long blockSizeBytes,
                             long ttl)
                      throws InvalidPathException,
                             LineageDoesNotExistException,
                             AccessControlException,
                             FileDoesNotExistException
        Reinitializes the file when the file is lost or not completed.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the file
        blockSizeBytes - the block size
        ttl - the TTL
        Returns:
        the id of the reinitialized file when the file is lost or not completed, -1 otherwise
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - the file path is invalid
        LineageDoesNotExistException - when the file does not exist
        AccessControlException - if permission checking fails
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the path does not exist

      • getLineageInfoList

        public List<LineageInfo> getLineageInfoList()
                                     throws LineageDoesNotExistException,
                                            FileDoesNotExistException
        Returns:
        the list of all the LineageInfos
        Throws:
        LineageDoesNotExistException - if the lineage does not exist
        FileDoesNotExistException - if any associated file does not exist

        plan - the plan for checkpointing

                           InvalidPathException

        Parameters:
